name: BukuWarung
headline: Accounting, Payments & Credit app for 60M micro-businesses inâ¦
description:
BukuWarung is SEA's fastest growing startup and we are building digital infrastructure for 60 million MSMEs in Indonesia. BukuWarung's vision is to empower 60 million MSMEs in Indonesia to become financially aware and enable them to manage and grow their business using our technology platform, starting with bookkeeping, online storefront and payments.

BukuWarung has raised $80M from top tier VCs globally: Peter Thiel's Valar Ventures, Goodwater Capital, Y-Combinator, Rocketship.vc, AC Ventures, Quona Capital, East Ventures, Golden Gate Ventures, SoftBank Partners, DST Global Partners, and strategic angel investors from Stripe, PayPal, Plaid, Grab, Gojek, Facebook, AirBnB, Fast, Mastercard.

founders.name: Abhinay Peddisetty, Founder
founders.description: Building Digital Infrastructure for MSMEs in Indonesia with BukuWarung, starting with a simple accounting app for bookkeeping. My experience is across building and scaling early to late stage internet companies (seed to series D) across SEA and India, where I built growth, partnerships and revenue teams.

generated_description:
**BukuWarung: Empowering Indonesia’s Micro-Businesses**

Founded in 2019, BukuWarung has rapidly evolved into Southeast Asia's fastest-growing startup, aiming to provide crucial financial tools for the 60 million micro, small, and medium enterprises (MSMEs) in Indonesia. With a mission centered around accounting, payments, and credit, BukuWarung is all about enabling these businesses to become more financially savvy.

The company’s vision is straightforward yet ambitious: to equip MSMEs with a robust technology platform that includes features like bookkeeping, online storefronts, and easy payment processes. In a landscape where many businesses struggle with financial management, BukuWarung stands out by simplifying these complexities, clearly addressing the needs of its users.

BukuWarung's impressive growth and potential have not gone unnoticed. The company has successfully raised $80 million from a roster of prestigious investors including Valar Ventures, Goodwater Capital, Y Combinator, and SoftBank, among others. This backing is a testament to the confidence top-tier VCs have in BukuWarung's mission and market fit.

With a team of around 250 employees based in Jakarta, the company is not just focused on growth in numbers but is building a solid foundation for lasting impact in Indonesia's business landscape. Led by Group Partner Gustaf Alstromer from their Y Combinator batch, BukuWarung is well-positioned to scale its operations and enhance the financial literacy of its user base.

For more information on BukuWarung, you can visit their website at [bukuwarung.com](http://bukuwarung.com/app). By focusing on fintech and SaaS solutions, BukuWarung is actively transforming how micro-businesses in Indonesia manage their finances, setting the stage for a more empowered and financially aware entrepreneurial ecosystem.
